body:
On Avicus's teamspeak there is a player called "Dj Avicus" who had a rank on the teamspeak server. He had a rank with a jukebox next to his name. How he got that rank was he would play music on Avicus's teamspeak to bring joy to all avicus users and everyone on Avicus. He was demoted for false harassment. He should have his rank back. Everyone in teamspeak enjoys what he does for the server, and without him the world of Avicus teamspeak would be a sad terrible no music world. So I ask you to give him back his official jukebox rank for the music and joy of Avicus. 


     Thank you for your time.
body_tagged:
On Avicus's teamspeak there is a player called "Dj Avicus" who had a rank on the teamspeak server. He had a rank with a jukebox next to his name. How he got that rank was he would play music on Avicus's teamspeak to bring joy to all avicus users and everyone on Avicus. He was demoted for false harassment. He should have his rank back. Everyone in teamspeak enjoys what he does for the server, and without him the world of Avicus teamspeak would be a sad terrible no music world. So I ask you to give him back his official jukebox rank for the music and joy of Avicus. 


     Thank you for your time.
title: Official Jukebox Rank

replies.body: I think the music rank would be a great idea if the majority of Team speak users were fine with it.

replies.body:
I don't enjoy it for the most part. It's fun when the staff kinda hosts a party but is annoying at other times.

I would be fine with a music only channel. And DJ only get's to play music in there. He should not be allowed to go into every chat and play music even when we ask to stop. I'm fine with him playing "peaceful" or relaxing music, but every kinda follows him around everywhere, which makes the chat he's in crowded, then it gets annoying.

I don't care if he gets his "Jukebox" rank back because it does nothing, no new permissions besides join Donor chats.
